DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to analyze the effects of an exercise program in the pulmonary function, cardiorespiratory fitness, diet quality index, physical activity, body composition, muscle function, agility, and psychological health in a group of children with asthma and respiratory symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of an Exercise Program for Children With Asthma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with Asthma following the GEMA 2009 criteria (Guía Española para el Manejo del Asma Spanish Guide for Asthma Management) at least 6 months prior to the study. Complete successfully both Cardiorespiratory and Functional Tests. Diagnosed with other chronic respiratory disease or condition Diagnosed with any chronic disease including cardiovascular diseases. Reduced mobility Uncooperative Poor adherence to medication
